resources.string: Uh-oh, no schedules. You should make one.

CREATE TABLE schedules (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, label TEXT, enabled INTEGER, monday INTEGER, " + "tuesday INTEGER, wednesday INTEGER, thursday INTEGER, friday INTEGER, saturday INTEGER, sunday INTEGER);

Current Mode: SCROLL

Drag the view using finger.
Long press to change the mode to SWIPE.
Double tap to reposition the view to normal.

Current Mode: FLIP

Swipe left, right, up, down to change the views
Long press to change to mode to SCROLL
